DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to retrospectively review our preliminary experience during a surgical trip to Tuxtla, Mexico, using suggamadex to reverse neuromuscular blockade following CPB and cardiac surgery for repair of CHD in infants and children.
DOC.brief_title: Suggamadex and Fast-track Cardiac Anesthesia in a Developing Country
DOC.criteria: Patients who underwent cardiac surgery and cardiopulmonary bypass in Tuxtla, Mexico in September 2015.
